import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import AddComment from './projectActs/AddComment' import PostCredits from './projectActs/PostCredits' import Comments from './projectActs/Comments' const ProjectSummary = ({project}) => { var coloring = {} function handleClick(event) { coloring = {color:'black !important'} } return(
{project.authorFirstName && project.authorFirstName[0]}{project.authorSecondName && project.authorSecondName[0]} {project.authorFirstName} {project.authorSecondName} more_vert

{project.title}

Load comments

{project.createdAt && project.createdAt .toDate() .toLocaleDateString('indian', { year: "numeric", month: "short", day: "numeric" })}

) } export default ProjectSummary
